attachments.displayName:
For you

Citrine is a yellow variety of quartz. Citrine is a joyful stone with bright energy which lights up many aspects of lives.

Citrine is a happy stone. It can bring happiness to the person who carries or wears it.

In the mental arena, citrine enhances mental clarity, confidence, and will power. The mental clarity and confidence support bringing increased creativity and honesty.

(source: http://meanings.crystalsandjewelry.com)
